scripts.prebuild: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const DB_ROOT=process.env.DB_ROOT||'..';const src=path.resolve(DB_ROOT);const dest='./kanarion_database_build';if(fs.existsSync(src+'/classes')&&!fs.existsSync(dest)){const dirs=['_meta','classes','combat','config','entities','items','stats','systems','ui','world'];dirs.forEach(d=>{const s=path.join(src,d);if(fs.existsSync(s))fs.cpSync(s,path.join(dest,d),{recursive:true})});console.log('Database copied for build from',src)}"
